creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: woven, blanket-like object with pile created with multicolored threads on back; chevrons on front, each woven in different pattern with white, blue, red, orange and tan yarn on maroon ground; rows of sequins sewn on top in a grid; twisted brown fringe on one short end
medium: Wool, cotton, sequins; plain weave, pile weave
title: Blanket (Hanbel)
